text: Hi, there! Thanks for dropping by. Would you like to know a little bit more about Matthew McCord?
Matthew is a full stack web engineer since 2016. He also has a passion for game development.
In his spare time, he likes to absorb software and game programming / design knowledge, hang out with his partner & doggos, play board games, and make music.
That's about all I can tell you now. Check out the LinkedIn, and play some of the games! :)
